@github/psotob" date: "Junio 15, 2022" format: revealjs: theme: default footer: "Programa de Formación Científica: Análisis Estadístico 2022 - Sesión 1b" logo: images/logo-ietsi.png transition: convex background-transition: zoom incremental: false slide-number: true preview-links: true # parallax-background-image: images/bg-ietsi-slide-first.png # parallax-background-size: "1920px 1080px" chalkboard: true code-block-background: true code-block-border-left: "#31BAE9" highlight-style: solarized echo: true multiplex: true touch: true auto-stretch: true link-external-icon: true link-external-newwindow: true --- ::: {.cell} ::: # Manejo básico de R ## Instalación y uso de paquetes ## Operaciones matemáticas ::: panel-tabset ### Aritmética ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} - Suma: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} 3 + 8 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 11 ``` ::: ::: - Resta: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} 3 - 8 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] -5 ``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} - Multiplicación ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} 3 * 8 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 24 ``` ::: ::: - División ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} 3 * 8 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 24 ``` ::: ::: ::: ::: ::: ## Variables y objetos ### Vectores atómicos y lista ### Dataframes y Tibbles # Manejo de datos ## Selección de variables ## Filtrado de datos ## Creación de variables # Análisis inicial de datos # Análisis descriptivo en R ## Descripción de variables numéricas ## Referencias ## ::: r-fit-text

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {

      // dispatch for htmlwidgets
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for reveal
    if (window.Reveal) {
      window.Reveal.addEventListener("slidechanged", function(event) {
        fireSlideChanged(event.previousSlide, event.currentSlide);
      });
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
